text: A 25-year-old man was arrested for rape of a 17-year-old girl here in Shoolagiri on Sunday. The accused Kalaiarasan, a mobile phone dealer in Shoolagiri, took the girl with a promise of marriage and sexually assaulted her. The girl was a relative of the accused. Based on a complaint by the victim at the All Women Police Station here, the accused was arrested.
title: Held on rape charge
